0.1.name: wordpress/editor-extender
0.1.description:
Extends the features of the rich text editor for Wordpress by adding most of the features you see at http://tinymce.moxiecode.com/example_full.php

Please submit any bugs or suggested improvements to https://github.com/bmsterling/Editor-Extender/issues

Need this plugin customized or need a plugin created, contact me via my contact form at http://kenzomedia.com

Also available through twitter, @bmsterling
